name: Adenike
greetingText: Your name is as beautiful and enchanting as the love we share.
wishText: May love surround you always, just like my heart is forever wrapped around yours. ;)
text1: It's your special day, my love! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday, my love! Yeee! Many many happy blah....
text2: That's what I was going to do..
text4: I realized I wanted to make it
outroText: Now come back and tell me if I made your heart smile.
replayText: Or click, if you want to relive it all over again.
